content: --कर्मन् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [अग्नौ कर्म स. त.] {1} cauterization. {2} action of fire. {3} oblation to Agni, worship of Agni (अग्निहोत्र); so °कार्य offering oblations to fire, feeding fire with ghee &c.; निर्वर्तिताग्निकार्यः <ls>K. 16</ls>;  °र्यार्धदग्ध <ls n="K.">39</ls>, <ls>Ms. 3. 69</ls>, <ls>Y. 1. 25.</ls>
